sourcesContent:
import * as React from 'react' import './pageThree.css' import Title from './components/title_bar' import Navbar from './components/nav_bar' import Font from './components/fnt_sze' export default function Activities(){ const [Lang,SetLang]=React.useState('EN') let LangEN,LangDE; if(Lang === 'EN'){ LangEN = 'block' LangDE = 'none' } else if (Lang === 'DE'){ LangDE='block' LangEN='none' } const [Fntsze,SetFntsze]=React.useState(20) return(
<Navbar onUpdate = {(value:string) => SetLang(value)} pg_Activities = '4px solid red'/> <div className = 'txt_box'> <h1 style={{display:LangEN}}>Activities</h1> <h1 style={{display:LangDE}}>Aktivitäten</h1> <Font fntSlct={(sze:number)=>SetFntsze(sze)} LangEN={LangEN} LangDE={LangDE}/> <hr className='hr_a'></hr> <ul style={{fontSize:Fntsze,lineHeight:'2em',display:LangEN}}> <li>Regular meetings on Tuesdays at 10 o'clock,where the following items will be discussed: </li> <ul> <li>Guidance and assistance with those day-to-day issues.</li> <li>Cultural themes: customs, holidays & traditions in Germany and other countries.</li> <li>Culinary programs and "Bring-a-Dish" mornings.</li> <li>Children's programs.</li> </ul> <li>Exercise with music (2 times per week ). </li> <li>English & German literature circles. </li> <li>Walking tours. </li> <li>International evenings, with lectures, buffets and performances. </li> <li>Summer party. </li> <li>Ladies's night out. </li> <li>Scrapbooking </li> <li>Library (English, Russian, Japanese literature and more) </li> </ul> <ul style={{fontSize:Fntsze,lineHeight:'2em',display:LangDE}}> <li>Regelmäßiges Treffen, dienstags um 10 Uhr mit folgenden Programmpunkten: </li> <ul> <li>Guidance and assistance with those day-to-day issues.</li> <li>Cultural themes: customs, holidays & traditions in Germany and other countries.</li> <li>Culinary programs and "Bring-a-Dish" mornings.</li> <li>Children's programs.</li> </ul> <li>Exercise with music (2 times per week ). </li> <li>English & German literature circles. </li> <li>Walking tours. </li> <li>International evenings, with lectures, buffets and performances. </li> <li>Summer party. </li> <li>Ladies's night out. </li> <li>Scrapbooking </li> <li>Library (English, Russian, Japanese literature and more) </li> </ul> <hr className='hr_b'></hr> </div> </div> ) }
